channel.title: Pivot table does not refresh when changed summed column
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I've been using the Redash pivot table for years without any problems. Recently I've noticed that table does not refresh when I change the column that is used to display data. As you can see in attached image I use a pivot table to group data by "volume" column and as a result, I would like to see Sum of "count" column. This works fine. But then when I change "count" to something else pivot table does not refresh. I have to either change "Sum" operation to something else like "Integral sum" or click left-right arrows which changes order of columns to force refresh on that table.
I've also checked at demo.redash.io and could not replicate that behaviour so maybe it was introduced in newer version (demo.redash.io is using 7.0.0, I'm using redash 8.0.2)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.0.2 * Browser: Opera 73.0.3856.284, Chrome 90.0.4430.212, Firefox 91.0.2 * Ubuntu 20
